com.digi.xbee.api.connection.serial

Class AbstractSerialPort

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.digi.xbee.api.connection.serial.AbstractSerialPort
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IConnectionInterface
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SerialPortRxTx

    public abstract class AbstractSerialPort
extends Object
implements IConnectionInterface
    Abstract class that provides common functionality to work with serial ports.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description

      static int DEFAULT_STOP_BITS
      Default number of stop bits: 1.

      • DEFAULT_PORT_TIMEOUT

        public static final int DEFAULT_PORT_TIMEOUT
        Default receive timeout: 10 seconds.

        When the specified number of milliseconds have elapsed, read will return immediately.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

           int offset,
           int length)
             throws IOException
        Description copied from interface: IConnectionInterface
        Reads the given number of bytes at the given offset from the connection interface and stores it in the provided byte array returning the number of read bytes.
        Specified by:
        readData in interface IConnectionInterface
        Parameters:
        data - The byte array to store the read data.
        offset - The start offset in data array at which the data is written.
        length - Maximum number of bytes to read.
        Returns:
        The number of bytes read.
        Throws:
        IOException - if there is any problem reading from the input stream.

      • setDTR

        public abstract void setDTR(boolean state)
        Sets the state of the DTR.
        Parameters:
        state - true to set the line status high, false to set it low.
        See Also:
        isCD(), isCTS(), isDSR(), setRTS(boolean)

      • setPortParameters

        public void setPortParameters(int baudRate,
                     int dataBits,
                     int stopBits,
                     int parity,
                     int flowControl)
                       throws InvalidConfigurationException,
                              ConnectionException
        Sets the new parameters of the serial port.
        Parameters:
        baudRate - The new value of baud rate.
        dataBits - The new value of data bits.
        stopBits - The new value of stop bits.
        parity - The new value of parity.
        flowControl - The new value of flow control.
        Throws:
        ConnectionException - if any error occurs when setting the serial port parameters
        IllegalArgumentException - if baudRate < 0 or if dataBits < 0 or if stopBits < 0 or if parity < 0 or if flowControl < 0.
        InvalidConfigurationException - if the configuration is invalid.
        See Also:
        getPortParameters(), setPortParameters(SerialPortParameters)

      • setPortParameters

        public void setPortParameters(SerialPortParameters parameters)
                       throws InvalidConfigurationException,
                              ConnectionException
        Sets the new parameters of the serial port as SerialPortParameters.
        Parameters:
        parameters - The new serial port parameters.
        Throws:
        ConnectionException - if any error occurs when setting the serial port parameters.
        InvalidConfigurationException - if the configuration is invalid.
        NullPointerException - if parameters == null.
        See Also:
        getPortParameters(), setPortParameters(int, int, int, int, int), SerialPortParameters
